meanings.definition: A small, flat surface on a computer or electronic device that is used to control the movement of the cursor by touching or swiping with a finger.
meanings.sent1: I use touchpads on my laptop to move the arrow on the screen.
meanings.sent2: The touchpads on tablets make it easy to navigate through apps.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks touchpads are magical buttons that summon treats.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the touchpads like skilled pianists on keys.
meanings.sent5: The touchpads, like tiny magic carpets, glide the cursor across the screen effortlessly.

meanings.definition: The act of touching or tapping on a touchpad to interact with a device.
meanings.sent1: His quick touchpads on the laptop showed his expertise in using technology.
meanings.sent2: She mastered the touchpads on her phone to send messages swiftly.
meanings.sent3: The touchpads in the museum exhibit made the art come alive with each tap.
meanings.sent4: Their synchronized touchpads on the control panel kept the spaceship on course.
meanings.sent5: With each touchpad, the device responded like a loyal friend awaiting commands.
